import React from 'react'; import RectangularPicture from '../images/gallery1.png'; // Importing rectangular picture import CirclePicture from '../images/gallery2.png'; // Importing circle picture import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; // Import Link from React Router const Tickets = () => { return (
{/* Link button on top of the rectangular picture */} {/* Rectangular shape picture */} {/* Circle shape picture overlapping at the bottom */}

JOLLOF SUMMIT

GHION HOTEL, Addis Ababa

Wed, 6th March 2024

10:00 am - 9:00 pm

Addis Ababa’s biggest Jollof Festival! The epic festival where flavor meets fun and your inner foodie comes alive!
With incredible flavors, incredible people and unforgettable vibes. It’s the most iconic Jollof Summit
coming together for an unforgettable taste adventure.

Tickets

Select Tickets to register

Access to VIP area

VIP lounge access

VIP parking

Double Ticket

Access to event area

Food and drink vouchers

); }; export default Tickets;
